# ArrayUtility.CreateComparer&lt;T&gt; method

Creates a GenericComparer that uses ArrayUtility.Compare.

```csharp
public static IComparer<T[]> CreateComparer<T>()
```

## Return Value

A GenericComparer that uses ArrayUtility.Compare.
